title: JeromeTash
author: JeromeTash
content: I have been trying to access Binance marketplace on my PC through their website or PC software, all in vain. I think I missed a step that I haven't yet figured out. Maybe someone more familiar could help. On the mobile app, it's pretty direct. On the Landing Page, I just click on More and the under Others, I can see MarketplaceOn the web version, I am not able to see anything about Marketplace from the Homepage, despite checking out different menus. Is there something, am not looking at?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: It doesn't look like it's integrated the way it is with the mobile app. There's this guide: https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/what-is-binance-marketplace-and-how-to-access-it-236b8333a67f407d8e44206278f572c7Which only shows how you can do it through the mobile app.The best way to do it on your browser is by using this link: https://pay.binance.com/en/merchant-stores?tab=1Which shows you all the merchants they support but you'd have to manually copy-paste the links, and browse them normally, and then whenever you want to pay, just choose "Binance pay" as an option.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Scroll down on the site and you will see this at the lowest part: Under the 'Products', click on 'Pay'.
